description: This Test Close PopUp Window, Then Clicks on Attractions Button input paris in Location and click search ButtonAfter It Test clicks Most Popular Button and choose first offered attraction , scroll down  select  available date , choose one ticket for adult and save price and name of attraction.finally it clicks on next button and validate price and name of attraction

steps.name: click available date to booking attraction
choose amount of tickets and get price
